page.title: 09PEOPLE'S JOBS IN HUNTINGDON.
page.content:
{ Sweeping the runways at R.A.F. Alconbury, the American air base is very dangerous.It is swept to prevent aeroplanes sucking up stones which would damage their engines.Work begins at 07.30 and ends at 18.00 Shift work at Harcostar LTD.begins at 15.00 and ends at 23.00.The machines are checked to see that they are in working order.After checking the machines,the plastic is checked before being put into the lorry. Work at Victaulic's begins at 06.00 and finishes at 13.00.My grandad works in the rubber department making innertubes for bicycles. As a long distance lorry driver for Peter Bennies LTD.dad gets up at 05.00.He delivers materials for building sites.
{
